scripts.dev: concurrently "gnome-terminal --tab -- ngrok http 8080" "wrangler dev" "sleep 5 && npm run updateWebhook"
scripts.updateWebhook: curl -s http://localhost:4040/api/tunnels/ | jq -r '.tunnels[0].public_url' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'BOT_TOKEN=$(jq -r ".BOT_TOKEN" ./src/_env.json); curl -X GET https://api.telegram.org/bot${BOT_TOKEN}/setWebhook?url={}/api/telegram/webhook'
